Title: Sex Kills
Plot: House takes the case of a man who experienced a seizure but wasn't aware it happened. When the man suffers a heart attack and needs a heart transplant, the team races to diagnose a dead woman's illness so they can harvest her heart to save their living patient.
GuestStars: Stephen DeCordova, Greg Grunberg, Jean St. James, Keri Lynn Pratt, Howard Hesseman, Yvette Nicole Brown, Ron Perkins, Adam Busch, Noel Conlon, Susan Grace, Marcie Lynn Ross, Craig Patton
